verses.verse: (God the Avenger of the Righteous) (Deut 32.35; Ps 50.2) O LORD, you God of vengeance, you God of vengeance, shine forth!
(Ps 7.6; 31.23) Rise up, O judge of the earth; give to the proud what they deserve!
(Job 20.5) O LORD, how long shall the wicked, how long shall the wicked exult?
(Ps 10.3; 31.18) They pour out their arrogant words; all the evildoers boast.
They crush your people, O LORD, and afflict your heritage.
They kill the widow and the stranger; they murder the orphan,
(Ps 10.11) and they say, “The LORD does not see; the God of Jacob does not perceive.”
(Ps 92.6) Understand, O dullest of the people; fools, when will you be wise?
(Ex 4.11; Prov 20.12) He who planted the ear, does he not hear? He who formed the eye, does he not see?
(Job 35.11; Ps 44.2; Isa 28.26) He who disciplines the nations, he who teaches knowledge to humankind, does he not chastise?
(1 Cor 3.20) The LORD knows our thoughts, (Heb the thoughts of humankind) that they are but an empty breath.
(Job 5.17; Heb 12.5) Happy are those whom you discipline, O LORD, and whom you teach out of your law,
giving them respite from days of trouble, until a pit is dug for the wicked.
(1 Sam 12.22; Rom 11.1, 2) For the LORD will not forsake his people; he will not abandon his heritage;
for justice will return to the righteous, and all the upright in heart will follow it.
(Ps 59.2; Isa 28.21) Who rises up for me against the wicked? Who stands up for me against evildoers?
(Ps 124.1) If the LORD had not been my help, my soul would soon have lived in the land of silence.
(Ps 38.16) When I thought, “My foot is slipping,” your steadfast love, O LORD, held me up.
(Isa 66.13) When the cares of my heart are many, your consolations cheer my soul.
(Isa 10.1; Am 6.3) Can wicked rulers be allied with you, those who contrive mischief by statute?
(Ps 56.6; Prov 17.15) They band together against the life of the righteous and condemn the innocent to death.
(Ps 59.9; 71.7) But the LORD has become my stronghold and my God the rock of my refuge.
(Ps 7.16) He will repay them for their iniquity and wipe them out for their wickedness; the LORD our God will wipe them out.
